title: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating and structuring web pages and web applications.

title: CSS
description: CSS is used to style and layout web pages, enabling responsive and visually engaging user interfaces.

title: React
description: React is a popular JavaScript library for building fast, interactive, and reusable user interfaces.

title: Node.js
description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime that lets you build scalable server-side and networking applications.

title: Flask
description: Flask is a lightweight Python web framework for developing secure and maintainable web apps and APIs.

title: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a flexible, document-oriented NoSQL database ideal for storing unstructured data at scale.

title: Python
description: Python is a versatile programming language widely used for web development, data science, AI, and automation.

title: Google Earth Engine
description: Google Earth Engine is a cloud-based platform for large-scale planetary geospatial data analysis.

title: Figma
description: Figma is a collaborative design tool for creating modern UI designs, prototypes, and design systems.
